## Goal

Get revenue and count summaries of transfers for a given time window.

## Methodology 

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='hide'}
library(clpr)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(lubridate)
source('~/Documents/connect_db.R')
rs <- connect_rs()
```

Load a sample of transactions.

```{r}
tr_df <- sample_day_of_transactions(rs, '2016-09-17', 10)
head(tr_df)
```

Make each row reflect a complete ride.

```{r}
tr_df <- drop_tagons(tr_df)
head(tr_df)
```

Create a dataframe summarizing transfers.

```{r}
transfer_df <- create_transfer_df(tr_df)
head(transfer_df)
```

## Outcome
```{r}
transfer_df
```
